set.name: DMBD-21 Chronicle Dark Side Deck: Big Bang

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution: Put on one of your darkness creatures. ■ Parallel Invasion: When one of your non-psychic darkness commands that costs 5 or more attacks, you may put this creature from your hyperspatial zone on top of it. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature on a non-evolution creature, discard a card from your hand. Then choose one of your opponent's creatures. It gets -9000 power until the end of the turn. ■ Meteorburn Awaken: At the start of your turn, put all cards from under this creature into your graveyard, then flip this creature to the side with the higher cost.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-21 Chronicle Dark Side Deck: Big Bang

property.name: Rules
property.value: {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of the following: ► Your opponent chooses 2 cards from their hand and discards them: ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures and they put a seal on it. (To seal a card, put the top card of your deck face down on it.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-21 Chronicle Dark Side Deck: Big Bang

property.name: Rules
property.value: {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, choose one of the following: ► Your opponent chooses 2 cards from their hand and discards them: ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures and they put a seal on it. (To seal a card, put the top card of your deck face down on it.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-21 Chronicle Dark Side Deck: Big Bang

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature due to the effect of a spell that costs 5 or less or ability of a creature that costs 5 or less, they can't choose this creature. (It can still be attacked or blocked.) ■ At the start of your turn, if your opponent has a seal, flip this creature to its higher cost side.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-21 Chronicle Dark Side Deck: Big Bang

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, if your opponent has a seal, summon a darkness or fire command from your graveyard for no cost. ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature due to the effect of a spell that costs 5 or less or ability of a creature that costs 5 or less, they can't choose your creatures that have "Forbidden" in their name.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-21 Chronicle Dark Side Deck: Big Bang

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you and your opponent play {GACHINKO JUDGE}. If you win,flip this creature to its STARSCREAM -BOT MODE- side ({GACHINKO JUDGE}: Each player reveals the top card of their deck, then puts it on the bottom. You win if your card costs the same as or more than your opponent.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-21 Chronicle Dark Side Deck: Big Bang

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When this creature is attacked, you may flip this creature to the STARSCREAM -ALT MODE- side and untap it. If you do, stop the attack.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-21 Chronicle Dark Side Deck: Big Bang

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When this creature is attacked, you may flip this creature to the STARSCREAM -ALT MODE- side and untap it. If you do, stop the attack.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-21 Chronicle Dark Side Deck: Big Bang

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Annihilating Soul Recall 4 (Whenever this creature attacks, you may choose 4 cards from your opponent's graveyard, your graveyard, or 4 cards from both graveyards. Put the chosen cards on the bottom of their owner's deck in any order. For each 4 cards chosen, you may use the following {SOUL RECALL}ability.): {SOUL RECALL}Your opponent chooses a card in their hand or battle zone and puts it on the bottom of their deck. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Awaken—At the end of your turn, if 3 or more of your opponent's creatures left this turn, flip this creature to its higher cost side.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-21 Chronicle Dark Side Deck: Big Bang

property.name: Rules
property.value: {QUATTRO BREAKER} ■ Each of your opponent's creatures gets -5000 power. ■ Each of your other creatures gets +5000 power. {RELEASE} - Dias Zeta, the Temporal Suppressor (When this creature would leave, flip this creature to its lower cost side instead.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-21 Chronicle Dark Side Deck: Big Bang

property.name: Rules
property.value: {QUATTRO BREAKER} ■ Each of your opponent's creatures gets -5000 power. ■ Each of your other creatures gets +5000 power. {RELEASE} - Dias Zeta, the Temporal Suppressor (When this creature would leave, flip this creature to its lower cost side instead.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-21 Chronicle Dark Side Deck: Big Bang

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's tapped creatures. ■ Awaken—At the end of your opponent's turn, if your opponent has no cards in their hand, flip this creature to its higher cost side.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-21 Chronicle Dark Side Deck: Big Bang

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, your opponent chooses a card in their hand and discards it, then chooses one of their creatures and destroys it. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-21 Chronicle Dark Side Deck: Big Bang

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, your opponent chooses a card in their hand and discards it, then chooses one of their creatures and destroys it. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-21 Chronicle Dark Side Deck: Big Bang

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Awaken—At the start of each player's turn, if you have 2 Angel Commands or Demon Commands that cost 6 or more in the battle zone, flip this creature to its higher cost side. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

card.name: Final Forbidden Deadtron, D2V3 / Deadly Bigbang

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ This creature costs 1 less to summon for each of your darkness and fire cards in your graveyard. It can't cost 0 or less. ■ Whenever your opponent puts a creature without tapping cards in their mana zone, your opponent destroys one of their creatures. TWINPACT ■ Put the top card of your deck into your graveyard. ■ If you have a field, draw a card.

property.value: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your graveyard. ■ If you have a field, draw a card.

card.name: Dorbro, Final Forbidden Gamma / Bone Dance Charger

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When this creature wins a battle, destroy this creature. TWINPACT ■ Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard. {CHARGER} (After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard.)

card.name: Final Forbidden Redtron, D2V3 / Forbidden Hand

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ While you are summoning this creature, you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, this creature costs 2 less to summon. ■ When you put this creature, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures. This creature and that creature battle. TWINPACT {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures that has power 9999 or less and destroy it. ■ If you have a field, choose one of your opponent's creatures and they put a seal on it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {NINJA STRIKE} 4 (Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks or blocks, if you have 4 or more cards in your mana zone and if during that attack you didn't use a "Ninja Strike" ability, you may summon this Shinobi for no cost. At the end of that turn, put this Shinobi on the bottom of your deck.) ■ When you put this creature, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 3000 or less.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-21 Chronicle Dark Side Deck: Big Bang

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ If you have a darkness or fire command and this spell is in your shield zone, it gets "shield trigger". ■ Chose one of your opponent's creatures. Your opponent puts a seal on it. {SEAL} (To seal a card, put the top card of your deck on top of that card face down. Whenever a Command is put, its owner puts a seal from one of their cards that has the same civilization as that Command into their graveyard. Sealed creatures are ignored.) ■ Put a darkness or fire psychic creature that costs 9 or less from your hyperspatial zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-21 Chronicle Dark Side Deck: Big Bang

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your commands gets "slayer". (Whenever another D2 Field is put into the battle zone, put this D2 Field into your graveyard.) D2 WRAP Denjara Switch: At the end of the turn, you may turn this D2 Field upside down for the rest of the game. If you do, summon a darkness or fire command that costs 6 or less from your graveyard or hyperspatial zone for no cost.}

At the end of that turn, put this Shinobi on the bottom of your deck.) ■ When you put this creature, choose one of your opponent's creatures. property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ If you have a field in the battle zone, you may summon this creature from your graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have a field in the battle zone, you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-21 Chronicle Dark Side Deck: Big Bang

property.name: Rules
property.value: {NINJA STRIKE} 4 (Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks or blocks, if you have 4 or more cards in your mana zone and if during that attack you didn't use a "Ninja Strike" ability, you may summon this Shinobi for no cost. At the end of that turn, put this Shinobi on the bottom of your deck.) ■ When you put this creature, one of your creatures gets "blocker" until the start of your next turn. (You may tap a creature that has "blocker to change your opponent's creature attack target to that creature.)

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-21 Chronicle Dark Side Deck: Big Bang

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ At the start of the game, put this Final Forbidden Field into the battle zone as a field linked by attaching 4 seals on each of its corners. ■ Your seals can only be removed when you summon a Darkness or Fire command that costs 5 or more or put it into the battle zone through ZERO once per turn. ■ You can't attack with creatures except commands, initials, or creatures that have "Forbidden" in their name. ■ This Final Forbidden Field can't leave the battle zone.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-21 Chronicle Dark Side Deck: Big Bang

property.name: Rules
property.value: {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When this creature Forbidden Big Bangs, your opponent puts a seal on each of their creatures. (While creatures are sealed, both players ignore that creature.) ■ Your opponent can't put seals from their creatures into their graveyard. ■ This creature can't be sealed. ■ When this creature would leave the battle zone, you may put 2 of its forbidden cores under this card instead. If you do, put one of your shields into your graveyard. ■ If this card is anywhere other than the battle zone, destroy all creatures, then you lose the game.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMBD-21 Chronicle Dark Side Deck: Big Bang
